security: [New] Roles for Accessibility Tester and User Manager

components: [New] Automatic learner’s pick for MQ and MCQ with several options

[Improved] Various issues with Open Text Input
[Improved] Focus and popup titles have been enhanced for screen readers

theme: [New] Option for selecting between Legacy and Improved block padding
[New] Added styles to support accessibilityfixes
[Improved] Focus styles for multiple choice questions containing a single correct answer
a11y: [Fixed] Contrast ratio on links added to text that will show on darker backgrounds

theme: [New] Alternate table styles for components that have dark blue bg
[Fixed] Multi choice fixed overlap of icon with buttons on submit
[Fixed] Corrected padding for instructions in text component .iconbox class
[Fixed] Centered block titles in block padding space
[Improved] Swapped the bold and non bold styles of headers and descriptions in the resources menu
[Removed] Double borders on tags
a11y: [New] Secondary focus for radio button for multi choice question
[Fixed] adjusted @esdc-cyan-text hex to meet color contrast
[Fixed] adjusted link colors shades to meet contrast with dark blue bg (popups, page header, narrative)

components: [New] Relaxed tracking available in Spoor extension. Courses can be marked as completed when 80% finished

authoring: [Fixed] Articles now copy at the right place

theme: [New] A new styling class for Text components has been introduced, but no icons are available yet
